meanings.sent1: The gooey marshmallow melted in the fire.
meanings.sent2: The fresh cookies were warm and gooey inside.
meanings.sent3: The gooey slime oozed out of the container and onto the table.
meanings.sent4: Her gooey hands clung to the sticky tape as she wrapped the gift.
meanings.sent5: The gooey chocolate cake was so moist and delicious.

meanings.definition: Covered in a thick, sticky substance
meanings.sent1: The gooey syrup dripped down the sides of the pancake stack.
meanings.sent2: The gooey candy apple was a sticky mess to eat.
meanings.sent3: The gooey glue made a perfect seal on the envelope.
meanings.sent4: His gooey fingers left a trail of stickiness on the doorknob.
meanings.sent5: The gooey honey coated the toast in sweetness.

meanings.definition: Having a texture that is thick and sticky
meanings.sent1: The gooey dough stuck to her fingers as she kneaded it.
meanings.sent2: The gooey mud made it hard to walk through the field.
meanings.sent3: The gooey paint dripped down the canvas in colorful streaks.
meanings.sent4: The gooey cheese stretched between the two slices of bread.
meanings.sent5: The gooey caramel hardened into a chewy treat.
